00014 eolComponentPercentBar *eol_component_get_percent_bar_data(eolComponent *component)
00015 {
00016   if ((!component)||
00017     (!component->componentData)||
00018     (component->type != eolPercentBarComponent))
00019   {
00020     return NULL;
00021   }
00022   return (eolComponentPercentBar*)component->componentData;
00023 }

00026 void eol_component_make_percent_bar(
00027     eolComponent  * component,
00028     eolBool         vertical,
00029     eolBool         ascending,
00030     eolFloat        percent,
00031     eolVec3D        statusColor,
00032     eolVec3D        backgroundColor,
00033     eolFloat        statusAlpha,
00034     eolFloat        backgroundAlpha
00035   )
00036 {
00037   eolComponentPercentBar * bar = NULL;
00038   if (!component)return;
00039   eol_component_percent_bar_new(component);
00040   bar = eol_component_get_percent_bar_data(component);
00041   if (bar == NULL)
00042   {
00043     return;
00044   }
00045   bar->statusAlpha = statusAlpha;
00046   bar->backgroundAlpha = backgroundAlpha;
00047   bar->vertical = vertical;
00048   bar->percent = percent;
00049   bar->ascending = ascending;
00050   eol_vec3d_copy(bar->statusColor,statusColor);
00051   eol_vec3d_copy(bar->backgroundColor,backgroundColor);
00052   component->data_free = eol_component_percent_bar_free;
00053   component->data_draw = eol_component_percent_bar_draw;
00054   component->data_update = eol_component_percent_bar_update;
00055 }

00057 eolComponent *eol_percent_bar_new(
00058     eolUint       id,
00059     eolWord       name,
00060     eolRectFloat  rect,
00061     eolRect       bounds,
00062     eolBool       vertical,
00063     eolBool       ascending,
00064     eolFloat      percent,
00065     eolVec3D      statusColor,
00066     eolVec3D      backgroundColor,
00067     eolFloat      statusAlpha,
00068     eolFloat      backgroundAlpha
00069     )
00070 {
00071   eolComponent *component = NULL;
00072   eolComponentPercentBar *bar = NULL;
00073   component = eol_component_new();
00074   if (!component)return NULL;
00075   eol_rectf_copy(&component->rect,rect);
00076   eol_component_get_rect_from_bounds(&component->bounds,bounds, rect);
00077 
00078   eol_component_make_percent_bar(
00079     component,
00080     vertical,
00081     ascending,
00082     percent,
00083     statusColor,
00084     backgroundColor,
00085     statusAlpha,
00086     backgroundAlpha
00087   );
00088 
00089   bar = eol_component_get_percent_bar_data(component);
00090   if (!bar)
00091   {
00092     eol_component_free(&component);
00093     return NULL;
00094   }
00095   component->id = id;
00096   eol_word_cpy(component->name,name);
00097   component->canHasFocus = eolTrue;
00098 
00099   return component;
00100 }

00102 void eol_component_percent_bar_free(eolComponent *component)
00103 {
00104   eolComponentPercentBar * bar = eol_component_get_percent_bar_data(component);
00105   if (bar == NULL)return;
00106   free(bar);
00107   component->componentData = NULL;
00108 }
00109 
00110 eolBool eol_component_percent_bar_update(eolComponent *component)
00111 {
00112   eolComponentPercentBar *bar = eol_component_get_percent_bar_data(component);
00113   if (bar == NULL)return eolFalse;
00114   if ((bar->max != NULL) && (bar->value != NULL) && (*bar->max != 0))
00115   {
00116     bar->percent = *bar->value / *bar->max;
00117   }
00118   if (bar->percent > 1)bar->percent = 1;
00119   if (bar->percent < 0)bar->percent = 0;
00120   return eolFalse;
00121 }
00122 
00123 void eol_component_percent_bar_draw(eolComponent *component, eolRect bounds)
00124 {
00125   eolRect r;
00126   eolComponentPercentBar *bar = eol_component_get_percent_bar_data(component);
00127   if (bar == NULL)return;
00128   eol_rect_copy(&r,component->bounds);
00129   eol_draw_solid_rect(component->bounds,bar->backgroundColor,bar->backgroundAlpha);
00130   if (bar->vertical)
00131   {
00132     r.h = component->bounds.h * bar->percent;
00133     if (bar->ascending)
00134     {
00135       r.y = component->bounds.y + (component->bounds.h - r.h);
00136     }
00137   }
00138   else
00139   {
00140     r.w = component->bounds.w * bar->percent;
00141     if (bar->ascending)
00142     {
00143       r.x = component->bounds.x + (component->bounds.w - r.w);
00144     }
00145   }
00146   eol_draw_solid_rect(r,bar->statusColor,bar->statusAlpha);
00147 }
00148 
00149 void eol_component_percent_bar_new(eolComponent *component)
00150 {
00151   if (component->componentData != NULL)
00152   {
00153     eol_logger_message(
00154       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00155       "eol_component_percent_bar:tried to make a percent bar out of an existing component\n");
00156     return;
00157   }
00158   component->componentData = malloc(sizeof(eolComponentPercentBar));
00159   if (component->componentData == NULL)
00160   {
00161     eol_logger_message(
00162       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00163       "eol_component_percent_bar: failed to allocate data for new percent bar\n");
00164     return;
00165   }
00166   memset(component->componentData,0,sizeof(eolComponentPercentBar));
00167   component->type = eolPercentBarComponent;
00168 }
00169 
00170 void eol_component_percent_bar_assign_values(eolComponent *component,eolFloat *max,eolFloat *value)
00171 {
00172   eolComponentPercentBar *bar = eol_component_get_percent_bar_data(component);
00173   if (bar == NULL)return;
00174   bar->max = max;
00175   bar->value = value;
00176 }
00177 
00178 void eol_component_percent_bar_set(eolComponent *component,eolFloat percent)
00179 {
00180   eolComponentPercentBar *bar = eol_component_get_percent_bar_data(component);
00181   if (bar == NULL)return;
00182   bar->percent = percent;
00183 }
